verses.verse: וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הַתְּכֵ֤לֶת <WH8504> And of the blue וְהָֽאַרְגָּמָן֙ <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֔י <WH8144> and scarlet עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> they made בִגְדֵי־ <WH899> cloths שְׂרָ֖ד <WH8278> of service לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <WH8334> to do service בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ <WH6213> [place] and made אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֤י <WH899> garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> for Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses פ

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> the ephod זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> and fine twined

וַֽיְרַקְּע֞וּ <WH7554> And they did beat אֶת־ <WH854> into פַּחֵ֣י <WH6341> thin plates הַזָּהָב֮ <WH2091> the gold וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <WH7112> and cut פְּתִילִם֒ <WH6616> [it into] wires לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> to be woven בְּת֤וֹךְ <WH8432> hope הַתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> [it] in the blue וּבְת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> hope הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <WH713> and in the purple וּבְת֛וֹךְ <WH8432> hope תּוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and the scarlet וּבְת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> hope הַשֵּׁ֑שׁ <WH8336> and in the fine linen מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> work חֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH2803> [with] cunning

כְּתֵפֹ֥ת <WH3802> shoulderpieces עָֽשׂוּ־ <WH6213> They made ל֖וֹ חֹבְרֹ֑ת <WH2266> for it to couple [it] together עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> by the two [קִצְוֹותֹו כ] (קְצֹותָ֖יו <WH7118> end ק) חֻבָּֽר׃ <WH2266> was it coupled together

וְחֵ֨שֶׁב <WH2805> And the curious girdle אֲפֻדָּת֜וֹ <WH642> of his ephod אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> of מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> the same הוּא֮ <WH1931> its כְּמַעֲשֵׂהוּ֒ <WH4639> that [was] upon it [was] of the same according to the work זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> thereof [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <WH7806> and fine twined כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> And they wrought אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stones הַשֹּׁ֔הַם <WH7718> onyx מֻֽסַבֹּ֖ת <WH4142> inclosed מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת <WH4865> in ouches זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold מְפֻתָּחֹת֙ <WH6605> graven פִּתּוּחֵ֣י <WH6605> were engraved חוֹתָ֔ם <WH2368> as signets עַל־ <WH5921> according שְׁמ֖וֹת <WH8034> with the names בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put אֹתָ֗ם <WH853> עַ֚ל <WH5921> on כִּתְפֹ֣ת <WH3802> them on the shoulders הָאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> of the ephod אַבְנֵ֥י <WH68> [that they should be] stones זִכָּר֖וֹן <WH2146> for a memorial לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses פ

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <WH2833> the breastplate מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> [of] cunning כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> like the work אֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> of the ephod זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> and fine twined

רָב֧וּעַ <WH7251> It was foursquare הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become כָּפ֖וּל <WH3717> double עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> they made אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> the breastplate זֶ֧רֶת <WH2239> a span אָרְכּ֛וֹ <WH753> [was] the length וְזֶ֥רֶת <WH2239> thereof and a span רָחְבּ֖וֹ <WH7341> the breadth כָּפֽוּל׃ <WH3717> thereof [being] doubled

וַיְמַלְאוּ־ <WH4390> And they set ב֔וֹ אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> in it four ט֣וּרֵי <WH2905> rows אָ֑בֶן <WH68> of stones ט֗וּר <WH2905> [the first] row אֹ֤דֶם <WH124> [was] a sardius פִּטְדָה֙ <WH6357> a topaz וּבָרֶ֔קֶת <WH1304> and a carbuncle הַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> row הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> this [was] the first
וְהַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> row הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> And the second נֹ֥פֶךְ <WH5306> an emerald סַפִּ֖יר <WH5601> a sapphire וְיָהֲלֹֽם׃ <WH3095> and a diamond
וְהַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> row הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> And the third לֶ֥שֶׁם <WH3958> a ligure שְׁב֖וֹ <WH7618> an agate וְאַחְלָֽמָה׃ <WH306> and an amethyst

וְהַטּוּר֙ <WH2905> row הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> And the fourth תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <WH8658> a beryl שֹׁ֖הַם <WH7718> an onyx וְיָשְׁפֵ֑ה <WH3471> and a jasper מֽוּסַבֹּ֛ת <WH4142> [they were] inclosed מִשְׁבְּצ֥וֹת <WH4865> in ouches זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold בְּמִלֻּאֹתָֽם׃ <WH4396> in their inclosings

וְ֠הָאֲבָנִים <WH68> And the stones עַל־ <WH5921> were corresponding שְׁמֹ֨ת <WH8034> [were] according to the names בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵ֛נָּה <WH2007> in שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten עַל־ <WH5921> corresponding שְׁמֹתָ֑ם <WH8034> according to their names פִּתּוּחֵ֤י <WH6603> [like] the engravings חֹתָם֙ <WH2368> of a signet אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one עַל־ <WH5921> were corresponding שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> with his name לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten שָֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> tribes

וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <WH6213> And they made עַל־ <WH5921> on הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <WH2833> upon the breastplate שַׁרְשְׁרֹ֥ת <WH8333> chains גַּבְלֻ֖ת <WH1383> at the ends מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work עֲבֹ֑ת <WH5688> [of] wreathen זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> [of] pure

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> And they made שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> two מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת <WH4865> ouches זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> [of] gold וּשְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> and two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> gold וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> rings עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> in the two קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> of the breastplate

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> And they put שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> the two הָעֲבֹתֹ֣ת <WH5688> wreathen chains הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold עַל־ <WH5921> in שְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> in the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <WH2885> rings עַל־ <WH5921> at קְצ֖וֹת <WH7098> on the ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> of the breastplate

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> And the two קְצוֹת֙ <WH7098> ends שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> of the two הָֽעֲבֹתֹ֔ת <WH5688> wreathen נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> they fastened עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> in the two הַֽמִּשְׁבְּצֹ֑ת <WH4865> ouches וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֛ם <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּתְפֹ֥ת <WH3802> them on the shoulderpieces הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> of the ephod אֶל־ <WH413> about מ֥וּל <WH4136> it פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> And they made שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וַיָּשִׂ֕ימוּ <WH7760> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> [them] on the two קְצ֣וֹת <WH7098> ends הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> of the breastplate עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפָת֕וֹ <WH8193> upon the border אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> of it which [was] on the side הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> of the ephod בָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> inward

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֮ <WH6213> And they made שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings זָהָב֒ <WH2091> [other] golden וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֡ם <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> of שְׁתֵּי֩ <WH8147> them on the two כִתְפֹ֨ת <WH3802> sides הָאֵפֹ֤ד <WH646> of the ephod מִלְמַ֙טָּה֙ <WH4295> underneath מִמּ֣וּל <WH4136> toward פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> the forepart לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> of it over against מֶחְבַּרְתּ֑וֹ <WH4225> the [other] coupling מִמַּ֕עַל <WH4605> thereof above לְחֵ֖שֶׁב <WH2805> the curious girdle הָאֵפֹֽד׃ <WH646> of the ephod

וַיִּרְכְּס֣וּ <WH7405> And they did bind אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹ֡שֶׁן <WH2833> the breastplate מִטַּבְּעֹתָיו֩ <WH2885> by his rings אֶל־ <WH413> to טַבְּעֹ֨ת <WH2885> unto the rings הָאֵפֹ֜ד <WH646> of the ephod בִּפְתִ֣יל <WH6616> with a lace תְּכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> of blue לִֽהְיֹת֙ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> above חֵ֣שֶׁב <WH2805> that it might be above the curious girdle הָאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> of the ephod וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִזַּ֣ח <WH2118> might not be loosed הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <WH2833> and that the breastplate מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> from the ephod כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> מְעִ֥יל <WH4598> the robe הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> of the ephod מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work אֹרֵ֑ג <WH707> [of] woven כְּלִ֖יל <WH3632> all תְּכֵֽלֶת׃ <WH8504> [of] blue

וּפִֽי־ <WH6310> And [there was] an hole הַמְּעִ֥יל <WH4598> of the robe בְּתוֹכ֖וֹ <WH8432> in the midst כְּפִ֣י <WH6310> as the hole תַחְרָ֑א <WH8473> of an habergeon שָׂפָ֥ה <WH8193> [with] a band לְפִ֛יו <WH6310> the hole סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִקָּרֵֽעַ׃ <WH7167> that it should not rend

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> And they made עַל־ <WH5921> on שׁוּלֵ֣י <WH7757> upon the hems הַמְּעִ֔יל <WH4598> of the robe רִמּוֹנֵ֕י <WH7416> pomegranates תְּכֵ֥לֶת <WH8504> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֖ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֑י <WH8144> and scarlet מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> [and] twined

וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> And they made פַעֲמֹנֵ֖י <WH6472> bells זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> [of] pure וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַפַּֽעֲמֹנִ֜ים <WH6472> the bells בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> between הָרִמֹּנִ֗ים <WH7416> the pomegranates עַל־ <WH5921> on שׁוּלֵ֤י <WH7757> upon the hem הַמְּעִיל֙ <WH4598> of the robe סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> between הָרִמֹּנִֽים׃ <WH7416> the pomegranates

פַּעֲמֹ֤ן <WH6472> A bell וְרִמֹּן֙ <WH7416> and a pomegranate פַּעֲמֹ֣ן <WH6472> a bell וְרִמֹּ֔ן <WH7416> and a pomegranate עַל־ <WH5921> on שׁוּלֵ֥י <WH7757> the hem הַמְּעִ֖יל <WH4598> of the robe סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about לְשָׁרֵ֕ת <WH8334> to minister כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [in] as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <WH6213> And they made אֶת־ <WH853> הַכָּתְנֹ֥ת <WH3801> coats שֵׁ֖שׁ <WH8336> [of] fine linen מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work אֹרֵ֑ג <WH707> [of] woven לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> for Aaron וּלְבָנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> and for his sons

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הַמִּצְנֶ֣פֶת <WH4701> And a mitre שֵׁ֔שׁ <WH8336> [of] fine linen וְאֶת־ <WH853> פַּאֲרֵ֥י <WH6287> and goodly הַמִּגְבָּעֹ֖ת <WH4021> bonnets שֵׁ֑שׁ <WH8336> [of] fine linen וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִכְנְסֵ֥י <WH4370> breeches הַבָּ֖ד <WH906> and linen שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> [of] fine twined

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַבְנֵ֞ט <WH73> And a girdle שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <WH7806> [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> and blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> the work רֹקֵ֑ם <WH7551> of the weaver כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס
